<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a923889e18d18e7f53ace52a374a70597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a923889e18d18e7f53ace52a374a70597">~AbstractDependenceGraphBuilder</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The main entry to the graph construction algorithm. It starts by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// creating nodes in increasing order of granularity and then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// adds def-use and memory edges. As one of the final stages, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// also creates pi-block nodes to facilitate codegen in transformations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// that use dependence graphs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The algorithmic complexity of this implementation is O(V^2 &#42; I^2), where V</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is the number of vertecies (nodes) and I is the number of instructions in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// each node. The total number of instructions, N, is equal to V &#42; I,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// therefore the worst-case time complexity is O(N^2). The average time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// complexity is O((N^2)/2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa6cc092387721c9933bb8ec763767c3d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa6cc092387721c9933bb8ec763767c3d">populate</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a022f8d18fe9e9e880c51db47e2f372db">computeInstructionOrdinals</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a56732d193d3946d953c77a80e07ef61a">createFineGrainedNodes</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a9c4196edca24d644ff96e55945abd207">createMemoryDependencyEdges</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a008891a00a9aec8710d95ec82fd72196">createAndConnectRootNode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#afba90b653098f15528a273ced632683a">createPiBlocks</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a2ca7af382aa1a34576aee355f364447c">sortNodesTopologically</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute ordinal numbers for each instruction and store them in a map for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// future look up. These ordinals are used to compute node ordinals which are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in turn used to order nodes that are part of a cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instruction ordinals are assigned based on lexical program order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a022f8d18fe9e9e880c51db47e2f372db">computeInstructionOrdinals</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create fine grained nodes. These are typically atomic nodes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// consist of a single instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a56732d193d3946d953c77a80e07ef61a">createFineGrainedNodes</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Analyze the def-use chains and create edges from the nodes containing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// definitions to the nodes containing the uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#ac76acbd497d18c7306f8120c6f11fb51">createDefUseEdges</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Analyze data dependencies that exist between memory loads or stores,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in the graph nodes and create edges between them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a9c4196edca24d644ff96e55945abd207">createMemoryDependencyEdges</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a root node and add edges such that each node in the graph is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reachable from the root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a008891a00a9aec8710d95ec82fd72196">createAndConnectRootNode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Apply graph abstraction to groups of nodes that belong to a strongly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// connected component of the graph to create larger compound nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// called pi-blocks. The purpose of this abstraction is to isolate sets of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// program elements that need to stay together during codegen and turn</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the dependence graph into an acyclic graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#afba90b653098f15528a273ced632683a">createPiBlocks</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Go through all the nodes in the graph and collapse any two nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39; if all of the following are true:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - the only edge from &#39;a&#39; is a def-use edge to &#39;b&#39; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - the only edge to &#39;b&#39; is a def-use edge from &#39;a&#39; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - there is no cyclic edge from &#39;b&#39; to &#39;a&#39; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - all instructions in &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39; belong to the same basic block and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   - both &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39; are simple (single or multi instruction) nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa58986a6df89ded5c86fc981ad2bf53c">simplify</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Topologically sort the graph nodes.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create the root node of the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a6d0ad7c2f9c9bd805cf19a4b8936e6ae"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a6d0ad7c2f9c9bd805cf19a4b8936e6ae">createRootNode</a>() = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create an atomic node in the graph given a single instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a49a5519e92004994b7d31bdded9fa0d9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodeType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a49a5519e92004994b7d31bdded9fa0d9">createFineGrainedNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a pi-block node in the graph representing a group of nodes in an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SCC of the graph.</span></CodeLine>
